summary: Netherlands national football team is the national football team of Netherlands.
full_text:
The Netherlands national football team  represents the Netherlands in international association football. It is controlled by the Royal Netherlands Football Association , the governing body for football in the Netherlands.
The team is colloquially referred to as Het Nederlands Elftal  and Oranje, after the House of Orange-Nassau. Like the country itself, the team is sometimes  referred to as Holland.
The Dutch hold the record for playing the most World Cup finals without ever winning the tournament. They finished second in the 1974, 1978 and 2010 World Cups, losing to West Germany, Argentina and Spain respectively. They won the UEFA European Championship in 1988.
title: Netherlands national football team
